items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: The Paste App is a minimalist and efficient web application built to help users quickly store, view, update, and manage text-based notes or credentials. Whether it’s code snippets, personal notes, or private login credentials (non-sensitive), this app acts as your lightweight digital clipboard — always just a click away.
items.title: Sawant-25/PasteApplication: The Paste App is a minimalist and efficient web application built to help users quickly store, view, update, and manage text-based notes or credentials. Whether it’s code snippets, personal notes, or private login credentials (non-sensitive), this app acts as your lightweight digital clipboard — always just a click away.
